article.title: Media (Images)
article.subtitle: An docbook2odf example
article.para: This article shows various examples of inserting images into a document. The first is an image that is placed directly inside the <article/> element.
The following media has multiple images, only the first should be used.

textobject.para: The bird on the cover of DocBook: The Definitive Guide is a wood duck. Often considered one of the most beautiful ducks in North America, the male wood duck has a metallic purple and green head with white streaks extending from its bill around the eyes and down to its blue and green, gold-flecked wings. It has a white neck, chestnut-colored chest, a white or red bill, and yellow-orange legs and feet. Females have more brown, gray, and subdueed hues.
